settings.menuDescription: By default, the system uses cache to handle updates, and reserves interface calls for fast access to your service applications
settings.layout: Layout, including six out-of-the-box  system layout
settings.layoutTopLean: Top (lean) mode, suitable for small projects
settings.layoutAside: Sidebar mode, Logo and menu on the left
settings.layoutAsideDark: Dark Sidebar mode, Logo and menu on the left
settings.layoutAsideLean: Sidebar (thin) mode provides a floating bar
settings.layoutAsideLeanDark: Dark sidebar (thin) mode provides a floating bar
settings.colorScheme: Color scheme, you can switch different color style
settings.themeColor: Theme color, which can also be adjusted with a custom theme color to fit your project
settings.toolbar: bar, click the card to close the unwanted  button
settings.component: Component Settings, you can flexibly configure the component style and location in the layout
settings.otherDescription: These configurations are critical to the system and can only be modified by code
settings.updateSuccess: The system Settings are modified successfully
settings.copySuccess: Copy succeeded, please paste it into the src/settings.ts file!
settings.backSuccess: System Settings have been restored to default Settings
